Description.Name: Fu Capacitor
Description.Details: The [[DM.UpgradeDefs[Gear_FuCapacitor],Fu Capacitor]], when coupled with a Cheatah Navigation Computer, [[DM.UpgradeDefs[Gear_KerbyInjectors],Kerby Injectors]] and using a set of KFC Blueprints allows for the installation of a Kerby-Fucheatah Console. The KF Console will allow for the calculation of Pirate Jump Points to allow for quicker travel to other systems, with the added risk of possible misjumps. This item is for Argo upgrade only, it will not install in mechs
